articles.title: iOS 18.0.1, iPadOS 18.0.1 fix some major bugs, including bricked M4 iPads - Ars Technica
articles.description: Apple claims it fixed a critical bug that bricked M4 iPads.

articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: OpenAI’s Canvas can translate code between languages with a click - Ars Technica
articles.description: New side-by-side document and code-editing feature catches up with Anthropic’s Artifacts.

articles.title: NASA Starliner Astronauts Complete Move to SpaceX Crew-9 Spacecraft - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams are preparing for their return journey on the Crew-9 Dragon spacecraft after initially arriving via the Boeing Starliner. They, along with newcomers Nick Hague and Aleksandr Gorbunov, completed essential suit and sea…
